testcase.name: YourLogo Registration and Login Test scenario
testcase.system-out: Given User is on YourLogo Landing Page......................................passed When Landing Page SignIn Link is Available..................................passed Then User clicks on SignIn Link.............................................passed Then User is on Login Page..................................................passed Then User Click on Create Account using new emailID.........................passed Then User Registers by providing personal details...........................passed Then User is on HomePage to verify his name.................................passed Then User Logsout of the application........................................passed

testcase.name: YourLogo Add Product and verify Product Details Test scenario
testcase.system-out: Given User is on YourLogo Landing Page_AddProductTestScenario...............passed When Landing Page SignIn Link is Available_AddProductTestScenario...........passed Then User clicks on SignIn Link_AddProductTestScenario......................passed Then User is on Login Page_AddProductTestScenario...........................passed Then User enters mailid and password to login to application_AddProductTestScenario.passed Then User navigates to Tshirt section and adds Tshirt to cart_AddProductTestScenario.passed Then User proceeds with Cart Pages_AddProductTestScenario...................passed And in Cart Payments Page user verifies the product details with actual product details_AddProductTestScenario.passed Then User Logsout of the application_AddProductTestScenario.................passed
